ISSUE.TITLE: 4.10 BETA - Feature Request
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 BETA You may consider adding a comment to the web.config file above this line. ` <aspNetCore requestTimeout="23:00:00" processPath="%LAUNCHER_PATH%" arguments="%LAUNCHER_ARGS%" ....` When deploying to Windows 2016 Server on Azure, change the auto-generated processPath="dotnet" to processPath="C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" to make it work. If you don't do this, the user will get this message: ``` HTTP Error 502.5 - Process Failure Common causes of this issue: The application process failed to start The application process started but then stopped The application process started but failed to listen on the configured port Troubleshooting steps: Check the system event log for error messages Enable logging the application process' stdout messages Attach a debugger to the application process and inspect For more information visit: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=808681 ``` Note when running the app on the server directly from the command line, the cli doesn't use the web.config so the app will run. Driving you crazy to figure out. I went through 2 other hosting companies who didn't figure that out before I found the answer. Hope this helps.
